text:
Stakeholder Rules

Everyone has to play by the rules, and there are different rules depending on whether you are at home (clean your dirty dishes in the sink), or out in the world (don't leave water on the hallway floor where someone could slip).

What rules or guidelines in your stakeholder's life (at home, work, or community) are directly or indirectly related to the design problem? How might these rules or guidelines impact the design problem or the possible success or failure of solutions?
